mapper.select: SELECT m.mb_no, m.mb_id, m.mb_nick, g.gu_no, g.gu_aft_grade, g.gu_bef_grade, m.mb_visit, m.mb_board, m.mb_comment, date_format(m.mb_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d' ) as mb_datetime, date_format(g.gu_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') as gu_datetime, case gu_state when '1' then '대기중' when '2' then '승인' when '3' then '반려' END AS gu_state_p, gu_state FROM member as m left join gradeup as g on m.mb_no = g.mb_no WHERE m.mb_no = #{memNo}
